meanings.definition: The base or support on which a statue or column stands.
meanings.sent1: The statue was placed on the sturdy pedestal.
meanings.sent2: The ancient sculpture rested on a marble pedestal.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the pedestal was a perfect spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, he was the pedestal that held her world together.
meanings.sent5: The pedestal elevated the artwork, making it the focal point of the room.

meanings.definition: A position of high regard or admiration.
meanings.sent1: She placed him on a pedestal for his kindness.
meanings.sent2: The singer was on a pedestal in the eyes of her fans.
meanings.sent3: The pedestal of fame can sometimes be a lonely place.
meanings.sent4: To her, he was not just a friend but a pedestal of strength.
meanings.sent5: His talent placed him on a pedestal above the rest of the competitors.
